## chain() function

Apply a list of functions to a table in series, returning the final output. Helper because Arquero does not have something akin to d3's `call`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function chain(table: ColumnTable, functions: ((table: ColumnTable) => ColumnTable)[]): ColumnTable;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  table | ColumnTable | table to apply function list to |
|  functions | ((table: ColumnTable) =&gt; ColumnTable)\[\] | list of function to apply, in order, to the input table |

<b>Returns:</b>

ColumnTable
